cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

compileAsC99()
set(theseTestsName connection_unittests)
set(${theseTestsName}_cpp_files
${theseTestsName}.cpp
)

set(${theseTestsName}_c_files
../../src/connection.c
)

set(${theseTestsName}_h_files
)

build_test_artifacts(${theseTestsName} ON)
